Line5.14638B: Here is a reward for your service. Old Ostaf pays his debts.
Line7.14638B: Didnâ€™t know the damned bugger was really following me. (laugh) Knocked me on the head and stole my gold tooth!
VoiceDir3.14638B: Bemused. A little heated at remembering a treasure goblin stole his tooth, but it happened a while back.
Line3.14638B: (laugh) I haven't seen this since my youth. I tracked a goblin hoping it would lead me to the realm of endless riches.
